GREY = '#D9D9D9'
BLACK = '#1B1516'
YELLO_ORANGE = '#EDAE49'
PINK_RED = '#D14958'
font = 'Goudy Old Style'

# user and password
authorization = {
    'Sojan': b'gAAAAABjh4m_9g40gtS1lE2PvgAdDZz5i4wNsJJyvDDH--0VY4BuBGCkSQL7hGAYZ0qX6kP3xDkokdtiLrNRGroqWBJbF-4wHQ==',
    'Anish': b'gAAAAABjh4m_cOAW0AkGwZQAscCvTK1D6ICbzknrWtpgbMf6a-n-xDjFTT_7EJ4WuAHvPmjJexccK-aYMgiR4KT75TCjkkQpggZY4VcwATs_1aSPPpMrbj4='
}
"""
global variable
"""
global authenticated
authenticated = False

def main():
    global authenticated
    """
    setting up the root screen.
    also we need to adjust the screen size to adjust to all the monitor sizes,
    so we get the screen info to setup the root screen
    """
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title('Invoice')  # giving the title to the window
    root.configure(bg=DARK_BLUE)  # setting the background color
    # getting screen information
    width_screen = root.winfo_screenwidth()  # getting the width of the screen
    height_screen = root.winfo_screenheight()  # getting the height of the screen
    root.geometry(f"{width_screen}x{height_screen}")  # setting the root to screen dimensions
    root.state('normal')  # maximizing the window
    """
    now we need to place the logo of riu
    also we need to authenticate the users.
    """
    # a new canvas over the root window to place components
    login_canvas = tk.Canvas(root, width=width_screen-round((160/1280)*width_screen) , height=height_screen-round((200/1280)*width_screen), bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    login_canvas.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor='center')
    logo_image = Image.open('logo.png')  # opening the riu logo
    resized_image = logo_image.resize((round((270/1280)*width_screen), round((200/720)*height_screen)))  # resizing the logo
    image = ImageTk.PhotoImage(resized_image)  # converting the logo to photoimage to display in tkinter
    logo = tk.Label(login_canvas, image=image, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)  # displaying logo as a label
    logo.place(relx=0.32, rely=0.35, anchor='center')
    """
    placing the texts besides the logo
    """
    key = b'khJ1kLe4S1KD9rBPUN5_uxrSB2GyNQJWklSSCVE4znU='
    # placing the nutan text
    nutan_text = tk.Label(login_canvas, text='Nutan', font=(font, round((40/720)*height_screen), 'bold'), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    nutan_text.place(relx=0.53, rely=0.25, anchor='center')
    # placing the research text
    research_text = tk.Label(login_canvas, text='Research &', font=(font, round((40/720)*height_screen), 'bold'), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    research_text.place(relx=0.582, rely=0.35, anchor='center')
    # placing the innovation center text
    innovation_text = tk.Label(login_canvas, text='Innovation Center', font=(font, round((40/720)*height_screen), 'bold'), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    innovation_text.place(relx=0.648, rely=0.45, anchor='center')
    """
    placing username and password field
    """
    # creating a rectangle
    rectangle = login_canvas.create_rectangle(round((300/1280)*width_screen),round((320/1280)*width_screen),round((840/1280)*width_screen), round((420/1280)*width_screen), outline=DARK_BLUE )
    # username label
    username = tk.Label(login_canvas, text='Username:', font=(font, round((18/1280)*width_screen)), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    username.place(relx=0.4, rely=0.67, anchor='center')
    # username field
    username_field = tk.Entry(login_canvas, width=round((20/1280)*width_screen), font=(font, round((15/1280)*width_screen)), fg=DARK_BLUE)
    username_field.place(relx=0.55, rely=0.67, anchor='center')
    # password label
    password = tk.Label(login_canvas, text='Password:', font=(font, round((18/1280)*width_screen)), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    password.place(relx=0.4, rely=0.74, anchor='center')
    # password field
    password_field = tk.Entry(login_canvas, width=round((20/1280)*width_screen), show='*', font=(font, round((15/1280)*width_screen)), fg=DARK_BLUE)
    password_field.place(relx=0.55, rely=0.74, anchor='center')
    """
    placing the login button
    """
    login = tk.Button(login_canvas, text='Login', font=(font, round((18/1280)*width_screen)), width=round((10/1080)*height_screen), height=1,
                    command=lambda: authentication(authenticated, login_canvas, username_field.get(), password_field.get()), fg=DARK_BLUE, bg=GREYISH_WHITE)
    login.place(anchor='center', relx=0.5, rely=0.9)
    def authentication(authenticated, canvas, user, pass
